mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.OLX AS "olx", a.xsxh AS "xsxh", a.xsxy AS "xsxy", a.xszy AS "xszy", a.xsbj AS "xsbj", a.xsnj AS "xsnj", a.xsxm AS "xsxm", a.lxr AS "lxr", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_yhkz( owid, yh_ref_owid, olx, xsxh, xsxy, xszy, xsbj, xsnj, xsxm, lxr, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{olx}, #{xsxh}, #{xsxy}, #{xszy}, #{xsbj}, #{xsnj}, #{xsxm}, #{lxr}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_yhkz SET owid = #{owid}, yh_ref_owid = #{yhRefOwid}, olx = #{olx}, xsxh = #{xsxh}, xsxy = #{xsxy}, xszy = #{xszy}, xsbj = #{xsbj}, xsnj = #{xsnj}, xsxm = #{xsxm}, lxr = #{lxr}, memo = #{memo}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.xsxh AS xsxh FROM `bckj_biz_yhkz` a where a.xsxh is not null;
mapper.update:
update bckj_biz_yhkz a set
a.xsxh=#{xsxh},
a.xsxy=#{xsxy},
a.xszy=#{xszy},
a.xsbj=#{xsbj},
a.xsnj=#{xsnj},
a.xsbj=#{xsbj},
a.lxr=#{lxr}
a.yh_ref_owid = #{yhOwid}
